title: Useful links
summary: Useful links I've found over the years.

body.raw:
Gray Enlightenment blog, notably his post on wealth creation 
- https://greyenlightenment.com/post-2008-wealth-creation-guide/

introduction to god.pdf, and god.pdf itself
- https://www.sharvesh.com/p/godpdf
- https://cryptofrenzy.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/god.pdf

whataboutism
- https://rationalwiki.org/wiki/Whataboutism

lesswrong
- https://www.lesswrong.com/posts/wEebEiPpEwjYvnyqq/when-money-is-abundant-knowledge-is-the-real-wealth

Kaczynski
- https://editions-hache.com/essais/pdf/kaczynski2.pdf

SuperMemo, some thoughts on memory
- https://supermemo.guru/wiki/Problem_of_Schooling

Chow Yong Han's blog (I don't know who this is)
- https://www.chowyonghan.com/
